participant_1.background:
I love cooking, and Thai food is my favorite to cook.
i recently broke up with my girlfriend.
I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
I am close to my family as we have always been there for each other.
I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to take care of myself and my cats.
I like all types of music, but I'm especially fond of Greek music because it reminds me of my family's heritage.
I played the drums at a beachside bar for a week.
I enjoy my time with my family on the beach, but I don't always keep up with them.
my dad and i own over 600 movies.

content.text: I'm good! Just got back from a long day of teaching kindergarten, but I'm ready to relax with some Thai food. What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out with my cats and listening to Greek music. I love all types of music, but Greek music is my favorite because it reminds me of my family's heritage.
That sounds nice! I used to play the drums at a beachside bar for a week, so I know how relaxing it can be to listen to music.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the drums.
It's not that hard, but it takes a lot of practice.
Well, I'm sure you were great at it!
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what are your plans for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go see a movie with my family. We have over 600 movies in our collection, so we always have something to watch.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the movies.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and have some fun.
Well, I hope you have a great time!
